name: The Fairy Story
description:
THE FAIRY STORY

Who am I? Where am I?

I find myself in this weird place when I wake up, and I barely remember anything. Heartbeat, piano song, and . . . The Fairy Story. . . 

A voice just pop up into my mind, and I couldn't stop to think about it. She told me to find the truth, to find her, but I don't even know her. It just feels familiar.

I want the truth, I want everything that this place hid. Can I, make it this time? 

Alexa. . . . . .

Yea, I remember something:

My name is Alexa. Can you help me?
